meanings.definition: The act of repeating or saying something again.
meanings.sent1: She made multiple iterances of the same request.
meanings.sent2: His iterances of the poem were flawless.
meanings.sent3: The parrot's iterances of 'hello' always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her iterances of love echoed in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's iterances of encouragement stayed with the students.

meanings.sent1: The iterances of the song were stuck in his head.
meanings.sent2: His iterances of gratitude were heartfelt.
meanings.sent3: The iterances of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The iterances of the clock reminded her of time passing.
meanings.sent5: The iterances of the pledge resonated through the crowd.
